bug.author: drozzy
bug.summary: Wrong import in tutorials for DQN
bug.description:
Here: <denchmark-link:https://pytorch-lightning-bolts.readthedocs.io/en/latest/reinforce_learn.html#dqn-results>https://pytorch-lightning-bolts.readthedocs.io/en/latest/reinforce_learn.html#dqn-results</denchmark-link>
It should be: from pl_bolts.models.rl.dqn_model import DQN and not: from pl_bolts.models.rl import DQN

comments.comment: Hi! thanks for your contribution!, great first issue!

Hey <denchmark-link:https://github.com/drozzy>@drozzy</denchmark-link> , you can actually do it both ways. In the , is already imported like below so you can also import like instead of . Hope this makes sense.
Oh, strange. I got import error when I did it the tutorial way.
